name: Dark Shade
description: Summon a shade version of yourself to attack an enemy and fight at your side for 18 seconds.   The shade slashes at an enemy, dealing 830 Magic Damage and occasionally whirlwinds all enemies around it, dealing 830 Magic Damage once every 2 seconds. The shade's attacks inflict Minor Maim, reducing the enemy's damage done by 5% for 4 seconds.
effectLines: Shade deals increased damage, and occasionally casts an area of effect attack.
